title: Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Five Studies of Ceilings with Grotesques; Two Studies of Ceilings. Verso: anatomical studies of toes with frontal and profile views.

Drawing, "Decorative Studies; Verso: Anatomical Studies", 1814–18.
1814–18. Pen and ink over graphite on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2314.
